pullRequest.title: Provide a customResources alternative that only accepts resourceType as an argument

beforeCommit.message: feat: Make custom resource list types optional/inferred

afterCommit.message: feat: Make custom resource list types optional/inferred

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Provide a `customResources` alterntive that accepts just the resource types as an argument.
          
          
            
            * Provide a `customResources` alternative that simply accepts the resource type as an argument.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,6 +7,7 @@
 
 #### Improvements
 * Eliminated the use of Doneables and simplified the internal DSL implementation.
+* Provide a `customResources` alterntive that accepts just the resource types as an argument.

nodes.bodyText: Suggested change * * io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Namespaced * if it is a Namespaced scoped resource. * {@link io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Namespaced} if it is a namespace-scoped resource.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -99,6 +99,49 @@ */ NonNamespaceOperation> certificateSigningRequests(); + /** + * Typed API for managing CustomResources. You would need to provide POJOs for + * CustomResource into this and with it you would be able to instantiate a client + * specific to CustomResource. + * + *

+ * Note: your CustomResource POJO (T in this context) must implement + * + * io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Namespaced + * if it is a Namespaced scoped resource.

@@ -99,6 +99,49 @@ */ NonNamespaceOperation> certificateSigningRequests(); + /** + * Typed API for managing CustomResources. You would need to provide POJOs for + * CustomResource into this and with it you would be able to instantiate a client + * specific to CustomResource. + * + *

nodes.bodyText: Is that a good idea to import this class? I've thought about using it as well but it looks really weird… 😄

commit.message: feat: Provide customResources without the CRD context agument
feat: Make custom resource list types optional/inferred

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @param listClass Class for list object for CustomResource
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -99,6 +99,45 @@ */ NonNamespaceOperation> certificateSigningRequests(); + /** + * Typed API for managing CustomResources. You would need to provide POJOs for + * CustomResource into this and with it you would be able to instantiate a client + * specific to CustomResource. + * + *

+ * Note: your CustomResource POJO (T in this context) must implement + * {@link io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.Namespaced} if it is a namespace-scoped resource. + *

+ * + * @param resourceType Class for CustomResource + * @param listClass Class for list object for CustomResource
